name: Thanh Tung

services.title: UI/UX
services.description: UI/UX skills help me create beautiful and eye-catching websites, through which the user experience will also become better.

services.title: Front-End Knowledge
services.description: Using knowledge of programming to code user-side applications, including visual elements, overall layout of websites or web applications. Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability and build solutions for users and customers.

aboutpara: I am a Front-end Developer with 6 months experience at FPT University in designing and building up commercial and personal websites for users. I passionate about learning and development with a desire to apply skills on a larger development team at business. Eager to tackle more complex problems and continue to find ways to maximize user experience.

I passionate about learning and development with a desire to apply skills on a larger development team at business. experiences.bullets: Find and buy their favorite books in the most easy way., Entire Customer UI designed with Figma., Using ReactJS framework., Online payment with Stripe., Authentication with Firebase and Restful API., Manage plan and timeline.
